The class {{tt|type_info}} holds implementation-specific information about a type, including the name of the type and means to compare two types for equality or collating order. This is the class returned by the {{ltt|cpp/language/typeid|typeid}} operator.

The {{tt|type_info}} class is neither {{named req|CopyConstructible}} nor {{named req|CopyAssignable}}.
